text: Herbert Kenneth Kunen (August 2, 1943August 14, 2020) was an American professor of mathematics at the University of Wisconsinâ€“Madison.http://www.math.wisc.edu/~apache/emeriti.html He worked in set theory. He also worked on non-associative algebraic systems, such as loops, and used computer software, such as the Otter theorem prover, to derive theorems in these areas. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American geometers Category:Scientists from California Category:Scientists from Madison, Wisconsin Category:Topologists Category:Algebraists Category:Set theorists
